  • Constructor Details

    • Problem

      public Problem(Compulsory.Student[] students, Teacher[] teachers)
      Constructor for Problem with initial arrays of students and teachers. Creates new arrays to avoid external modification.

  • Method Details

    • addStudent

      public void addStudent(Compulsory.Student student)
      Adds a student to the array if not already present. Resizes the array if needed.

    • addTeacher

      public void addTeacher(Teacher teacher)
      Adds a teacher to the array if not already present. Resizes the array if needed.

    • getAllPersons

      public Person[] getAllPersons()
      Returns an array containing all persons (students and teachers). Assumes Student and Teacher both extend Person.

    • allocateProjects

      public void allocateProjects()
      Allocates projects to students from teachers' proposed projects. Each project can only be assigned once.

    • getStudentCount

      public int getStudentCount()
      Returns the current number of students.

    • getTeacherCount

      public int getTeacherCount()
      Returns the current number of teachers.
